plot: With Bosnian war criminals on one side and Interpol on the other, a former champion cyclist and his crew of bike messengers turned bank robbers find a way to break into an impenetrable vault.
title: Critical Mass
plot_es: With Bosnian war criminals on one side and Interpol on the other, a former champion cyclist and his crew of bike messengers turned bank robbers find a way to break into an impenetrable vault.
plot_en: With Bosnian war criminals on one side and Interpol on the other, a former champion cyclist and his crew of bike messengers turned bank robbers find a way to break into an impenetrable vault.
